title: Sampler, 1808
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Counted stitches.
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased in Exeter, NH.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Bands of geometric pattern, four alphabets and two sets of numbers. At the bottom is a wreath containing the initials I.C.E. and a G. Two birds on either side of "1808."

tombstone.epitaph:
